basic.description: A laboratory-based course designed to explore in greater depth a sub-group of the techniques studied in PHGY-840* and involving at least two full weeks of intensive laboratory work.  The techniques will be chosen to complement the student's graduate research. Winter or Spring/summer term.  R.J. MacLeod.  Not offered 2010-2011.
basic.subject: PHGY
basic.title: Digestive Sciences II
